abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel, Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko and French Pres Francois Hollande call for end of violence in Ukraine at meeting in Berlin; meeting was meant to show Russia that three countries still believe in value of cease-fire.
lead_paragraph: In two speeches, President Petro O. Poroshenko spoke of Ukraine’s tension with Russia, and the leaders of Germany and France again voiced support for a deal negotiated this year.

headline.main: European Leaders Make a Show of Support for Ukraine on Its National Day
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Ukraine: Leaders Press for Cease-Fire

snippet: In two speeches, President Petro O. Poroshenko spoke of Ukraine’s tension with Russia, and the leaders of Germany and France again voiced support for a deal negotiated this year.
